google_play_reviews.content: So close to great, but giving no access to the rest of your apps is completely unhinged. Just let me scroll down for the full list. How is this not obvious? Edit: It seems like this is just a clone of the open source "unlauncher", but with this critical functionality removed, which is even more confounding.
dunno if a pure colour background less RAM consumption but 7 shortcuts for applications not enough
How To find All Apk I've installed? Yet O'launcher could doing that. Thanx please Dev make it available_ just 7shortcut is good (still available). Gracias
Nice idea just where are the apps. Kinda useless if you have to add apps one by one kinda. Can't do it. Thanks for making the app
OMG amazing It's changed my way of using my phone
Best laucher for focused people.
This is fantastic. Like this work. Good bless you
Great. Does as intended. Sometimes, I take my phone unconsciously and since I cannot find a distracting app soon, I end up leaving my phone. Very few distractions. I cut my phone use by 60%.
Unable to use.
This launcher is an easiest way to dump your phone. You can't access to your app easily and that's a good new. This will REALLY prevent you from tons of unconscious nonsense taps.

Just amazing, i have used lots of Productivity launcher, but this is the app which really do the work. Best thing is that how it block the swipe up to access all the apps . It allows to have one 6 apps which i needed and nothing extra. That save lots of my time. Highly recommended, for who really what to work on their mobile addiction.üëçüèªüëçüèªüëçüèªüëçüèªüëçüèª
simple and works fine.

Hey this is great aap but you should add lock system because many like me not in control Itself so you just lock things like if you wana add aap you should enter pin. So I can give pin to other and 3 emergency in a day that gives work in 3 time without pin. Something like that it will help more. Thank you.

So far I'm loving it. It's almost exactly what I'm looking for, to give myself a regular "digital detox", while still keeping my smart phone. What I'd really love to have is some kind of challenge BEFORE I go into danger areas such as Customize Apps, or Device Settings, where I could access other apps. That challenge would be something like type in a long phrase (the hard way, no voice recognition), do a long division problem, or just something tedious, that takes a while to do.
Add double tap lock option
I will not use it because i dont have the choice to select how many apps i need in the home screen

I was having so much expectatives, I was wrong... there is no option to customize the size of text so I can see all the apps that I added to the main screen, nor option to search automatically for the apps even that I haven't added to the main screen
This app is awesome! I found myself using my phone less in just 3 days! A big THANK YOU to the developer!
Excellent
Cool
One of the best launchers out there and that too open source!!!

Best minimal launcher
Exactly what I was looking for. No ads. 5 stars from me.
Just try to access other apps not on home screen.. just try!! Frustrating

Clean & minimalistic launcher. I almost liked it but here are some caveat: 1) few customization for quality of life improvement like lack of text size & typeface adjustment, color schemes & limited app list. 2) No app drawer. In order to access any app, you need to add them on the list. Overall, home screen is only good if you're using a few apps . My suggestion, start by making an intro when you fist open the app (I had to discover & experiment on the options without any info.)
Fewer distract, much concentrate
This combined with App Dialler Pro is makes Android perfect for me.
A little bit too restrictive, but excellent anyway. It does help reduce phone usage. Plus, it's free, open source and without ads.

It is very good for reducing time but you have to pay for most stuff and the home screen only shows 7 or 8 default apps if they fixed that and made a search for apps this would be a lot better especially because it puts me off using this app and if I want to go to an app it takes a while making me spend longer looking for apps
little more addition by protecting the simplicity it will be just awesome... being free amd open source is the most important. ggwp.
Clean, minimalist and help focus do great works without distracted notifications.
more customization, personalization of this launcher app please.. from changing of fonts, changing wallpaper from album and add battery icon to homescreen.. i love it .. üòä
Great launcher! Can you please add a search bar on the home screen that'd be amazing!
Very minimalist and lightweight app. Love it. Thank you üëçüëçüëçüëçüëç
We need to do list
Below clock date doesn't show month properly and you can show the options directly on swipe instead of giving a button on different screen, one icon on main screen will also work.
Free, lightweight and no permissions. Best minimalistic launcher.

I love the simplicity of this launcher and how it focuses on what's most important to you. The home screen has everything I need EXCEPT customization. I love the fact that a tap can open your alarm or calendar but I hate that it's the default app. So default calendar is Google Calendar but I don't use that. I have a different preference. Fix that and I'd give you five stars but for now I'm uninstalling because it's rigidity makes it useless
Omg so gooooood! The perfect and unique app I want. the only app that I give a comment because it is the best. GREAT for breaking phone addiction

+5‚≠ê for a very very effective launcher which is free and with absolute zero ads and IAP. -1‚≠ê because I personally do not like the animation it does when switching from any app to home screen. I can't really pinpoint this why but the animations feels really clunky and slow to fade. I want a minimalistic launcher to have crisp and fast animation. Also give us an option to align the app names to right, left or centre.
nice.
After the update there's an annoying icon on the left corner of then screen. Please, make it optional.
üî•üî•
Let me take some time to appreciate you sir. Your app saves me a lot of time. Thx again works flawlessly on my new phone

Works great for me, but I did cheat it a little to make it more comfortable, using Quickball for all the tools that I might need occasionally while in rush (like calculator, notes etc). Yet, I really like it, beacuse my phone is much cleaner now and I don't get lost in all these hoards of apps that I would sometimes use once a month. Only necesary things. Also, UI is very simple and pleasant, which is just what I need, but I wouldn't mind some customization for clock appearance. Thank you!
Great minimal launcher.

So far I love it. My phone sucks in my attention too much. I love that this app completely strips away the visual stimulation of the homescreen. And the absense of a traditional app drawer is a Godsend. It makes finding distracting apps a little more tedious which is a good thing. Now I open my phone and have a second to think about why I'm using it rather than being ambushed by vivid colors and icons screaming at me.

Don't waste your time with reading other comments, just try it. That's the best.// I think you can add these features: 1- You can adjust a ring to clock and the ring of the clock according to the remaining battery. 50% charge = a half circle, like this or upper right icon we can see our battery directly. 2- Selecting another apps for calendar and alarm. I'm not using my phone's default alarm app and I couldn't change it. I added my alarm app to the home screen. 3- Support to another languages.
Best
The constraints this launcher provides are the best I've encountered to counter habitual procrastination. Plus it looks cool!
Excellent simple launcher. The best of what I tried.
Totally stops me wasting time on my phone and looks great.

Always end up coming back to this launcher no matter how many other minimalist launchers I try, can't fault it. Would be cool to have an option to see time spent on phone and on apps but honestly I really like the simplicity as is so that would just be extra!
Exactly what I need as a student. The only complaint is that navigation bar is still white even in dark theme. It is slightly annoying visually. Edit: It resolved itself with android 11.

Make smartphone simple. I like it... But i want to customised the color for theme. Black/Pink, Black/Red, Black/Green, White/Blue, Yellow/Purple... Almost everthing is ok except for color. Available theme now is not suitable with my smartphone.

Works great! Quite helpful when I sit down to to homework. The only thing it is missing is a link to the launcher settings. I want to use this app only while I am working on homework, so I would like to be it easier to switch back to my default launcher.
Using this on palm phone for a more minimal setup. Works wonderfully! Only thing is that on this particular phone (which already has bad battery life) it makes the battery worse, not really sure why.

Minimalistic & clean design. Phone runs much faster & smoother. Since I got to pick only 7 apps, it makes me rethink what's really essential & help reduce screen time. I've also got rid of my social media & mobile gaming addiction because of this. Thanks developer for making this awesome free launcher!
Pressing home does not open the rest of my apps?
Where is the Notes feature üò™üò™
7 important apps on the screen is good but doesn't means rest of the application are totally useless. At little gesture or icon to explore all is there.
Cannot access other installed apps by pressing home button (even those this is default launcher). I have to change launchers to find my other apps.
Best
good app
Can we add "scheduled apps" feature?)

I'm super looking forward to working on this or similar xD

Now because of other apps branched off of this one, I'm more focused on making it more modular. And then I go all out on new features

google_play_reviews.content: Perfect for anyone who is tired of complications and just wants their phone to do a few things without the clutter.
I love this app bcoz it is free and no ads... But i wanna suggest that this app need to keep improving. And this app deserve more ‚ù§love... Try to make this app better than less phone app.
I love your app! I use this with fast finder app and lock screen app, cheers!
Amazing App but it would be great if it has In built TASK feature on Home screen to carry on with tasks of the day without getting distracted
Best among minimalist launcher. Request, there should be option to allow custom theme colour and To do list.

This app is truly amazing! There is only one feature I am missing: uninstalling apps. Because sometimes I am weak and install distracting apps like reddit on my phone and I would like to be able to quickly remove them without using the Play Store (requires internet) or temporarily using the default launcher.
I would rate 5 star if there are double-tap for wake up screen. My power button is almost can't use. I hope you can create this feature.

This is the only minimalist launcher where I can access my work profile apps. Kudos for that. I'd give 5 stars if we were able to access all apps. At some point I will need to check my bank or something other than the limited apps I'm able to add. As a workaround I've added an additional launcher to the list that lets me open all apps. It's annoying but it works in those cases where I need something not on the limited app list.
Its life changing

My all time favourite launcher after trying many launchers because they ask for unnecessary permissions, ads, and most of them are paid but now I finally got Slim launcher with no distractions and I am loving it thanks to the developer of the app..ü§ó

This app is 10/10 - forces you to constrain your phone use in a way that naturally prevents you from wasting time messing about with unneeded apps. Has been very helpful. HOWEVER, it seems to have broken upon my updating to Android 11 (can no longer open apps from the homescreen or add new ones to it). Presume a fix is in the works?
google_play_reviews.replyContent: All Android 11 I've spoken to have faced this issue and it's really bad. In definitely working on it

google_play_reviews.content: This stopped working with Android 11. Now when I go to add an app only two show up our if all the apps I have installed. I can't open anything from it anymore and have gone back to using the original launcher. If this is resolved I'll come back and change this to 5 stars because I love this launcher so much. Thank you
I like the app. It is simple, it distract less.. Hoping for some widgets update..and different colour themes and different fonts..
Really good help me Focus Please add a native Lock feature
I like this launcher style but I think add some more features like app drawer and wallpaper and I like you launcher concepts
Ok

was wondering if it is possible to have a launcher without icons which can spend more space for bigger texts also lower ram usage -7 applications can be added only not enough -if not graphics animations texts can be appeared instant
Fantastic
Near perfect!!! A few apps can b added only..this makes using some other app a bit annoying by adding and removing
This is the only minimalist app which has feature like less phone but is more customizable rather than you have purchase them u get them for free with the download.

Very nice indeed. Good to have phone and camera always there. I added just wa email and a notepad. I use it like a normal app to have a slim face for everyday. If I want to reach all my apps I just press the out button and pass to the standard gui. But otherwise I'm always with this Slim Launcher! 5 stars certainly!

It's the best launcher. Nice to have 7 apps. With this launcher I feel like I have the best phone in my hands. Not because the phone, It's because this beautiful launcher. Sometimes 7 apps aren't enough that's why I use this launcher with the app called App Search Plus, it's the best combination you could ever have. I love the big timer on the main screen, and if you press there, the alarm clock app opens. I love too, the calling app and the camera are always there. Please, add emergency call.

Love it! I wanted phone icon to be easier to access - added phone app into favorites. Wanted more apps to use - added drawer app to favorites. So, it does the job, but still pretty customizable. Thank you!
Searching apps is case sensitive (it should not be ) and add an option to show app drawer for people who want it . Nice work , really appreciate it.

I downloaded this to simplify my UI, but it actually made it more complicated. I spend more time configuring my settings to get to an application than I do in the applications themselves. I like the design but the seemingly needless restriction is too much of an inconvenience for me to continue using it.
I like it...üòá Simple, no diversions...üëåüèΩüëåüèΩüëåüèΩ

Really like this launcher, great to simplify and minimize my phone use. I am having the same issue as another user where hitting the 'options' button will occasionally close the launcher and revert to the system default.
There's only 6 apps to use. how to use the rest of my apps.. where to find them ? no use of this app

love it best one I've found so far but having some issues e.g. sometimes clicking options will make the launcher close and you can just see the normal app screen. secondly quite often the options bit disappears and you can't swipe up or see the clock only your four chosen apps
Pressing the home butto does not brings all apps instead it brings recent apps being too restrictive. This launcher is best among its kind but does not his aceess to all apps .
No access to all apps, where can i see my all apps?
Love the app
